Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level High School. Limit the output to 50 words. Human aging is a natural process where our bodies gradually change over time. It starts from birth, but noticeable signs appear in our 30s and 40s. Understanding human aging helps us maintain our health and quality of life as we get older.
